attributes.additional_details: WE CARE! and we want Joseph Kony Ugandan guerrilla group leader, head of the Lord's Resistance Army  Stopped from causing any more pain and suffering to over  66,000  African Children and many more  if he is not stopped forced to fight for them and made to kill there own parents. we want  a stop to the  violent campaign, child sex slavery, child soldiers, Rapes, Murders, and brutal violence!  Have 2012 the Year he is arrested and put to justice.
